description: Detect usage of the "driverquery" utility to perform reconnaissance on installed drivers
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Potential Recon Activity Using DriverQuery.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:*driverquery.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"drvqry.exe")) AND ((process.parent.executable.text:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\mshta.exe)) OR (process.parent.executable.text:(*\\AppData\\Local\\* OR *\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Windows\\Temp\\*))))
